summary: Implements GPU‑accelerated solvers for sparse linear systems and related linear algebra operations, wrapping CuPy and cuSOLVER functionality to provide high‑performance sparse matrix factorization and solution methods.
business_intent: Enable fast, scalable scientific and engineering computations on NVIDIA GPUs by offering efficient sparse matrix solvers, reducing runtime for simulations, data analysis, and machine‑learning workloads that involve large sparse systems.
